member.name: T:MindFusion.HolidayProviders.IHolidayProvider
member.summary: Represents an object, which can provide arrays of culture-specific holidays.

member.name: M:MindFusion.HolidayProviders.IHolidayProvider.GetHolidays(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns all holidays in the specified time interval.
member.param: The start of the time interval.
The end of the time interval.
member.returns: An array of Holiday objects representing the holidays in the interval of interest.

member.name: M:MindFusion.HolidayProviders.IHolidayProvider.GetHolidays(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns all holidays in the specified year.
member.param: The year.
member.returns: An array of Holiday objects representing the holidays in the year of interest.
